aboutMe.name: Harris Arvanitis
aboutMe.details:
As an Experienced Software Engineer, I specialize in developing high-quality software solutions using .NET and T-SQL. Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a proven track record of driving project success through effective collaboration with cross-functional teams. I excel at optimizing code, designing databases, and solving complex problems to ensure optimal performance. 

With a Master of Science in Advanced Software Development and Artificial Intelligence from the University of Piraeus, I possess the technical knowledge and expertise to deliver innovative solutions that meet business objectives. 

As an enthusiastic learner, I remain up-to-date with the latest emerging technologies, enabling me to continuously improve my skills and deliver innovative solutions.
